project.objective: This project contains of one work package with 10 tasks. The specific objectives for the SME-instrument phase 1 feasibility study are to: • Deeper knowledge of the technical, economic and practical viability of the innovation as a ground for a decision of continuing the innovation process in a phase 2 project or redirect the innovation process (all tasks) • Map where demonstrations actions can be made with varying conditions and geographical location which links to market potential and technological challenges (task 1) • Investigate potential knowledge partners for phase 2 (task 2) • Get deeper market intelligence and define the European dimension for the commercialisation of the innovation (task 3) • Investigate the willingness to pay and perceived benefits by users (task 4) • Develop a communication strategy to be used during phase 2 and 3 (task 5) • Elaborate an exploitation plan including a strategy for pricing, financing and organisational changes needed especially sales and distribution organisation (task 6) • Elaborate an IPR strategy and have full knowledge of the development path i.e. freedom to operate (task 7) • Prepare the innovation for demonstration (to be made in phase 2) including CE-marking of the innovation to enable demonstration in medical clinics (task 8) • Elaborate Business Innovation Plan 1 that takes into account the results of task 1-8 and will present predicted business- and market opportunities (Task 9) • Coordination of the feasibility study (Task 10)
project.title: ShowerPod
